Having this section of XML in a table crashes Fop 0.94, with a non-descriptive
error message (below). I'm not entirely sure if it's the header itself, or
because it doesn't contain anything, but it works fine with all previous versions.

<fo:table-header>
  <fo:table-row>
    <fo:table-cell number-columns-spanned="2">
      <fo:block></fo:block>
    </fo:table-cell>
    <fo:table-cell>
      <fo:block></fo:block>
    </fo:table-cell>
  </fo:table-row>
</fo:table-header>

text:
I couldn't reproduce the error. That said, this is very probably related to bug
#43766 which is now fixed. Please try again with the latest revision of the
Trunk, and feel free to re-open the bug if necessary (but please attach a
complete FO file showing the error).
